paramInformation.label: Alarm Cancellation Delay
paramInformation.description: Time alarm still indicated after alarm condition has ceased

paramInformation.label: Select alarm type (visual/acoustic)
paramInformation.description: This parameter allows for deactivation visual and acoustic alarm.

options.label: Acoustic alarm inactive, visual alarm active
Acoustic alarm active, visual alarm inactive

paramInformation.label: Type alarm frame sent to 1st assoc group
paramInformation.description: Type of cmd frame sent in case of flooding

paramInformation.label: Forced Level of Dimming group 1
paramInformation.description: Parameter specifying forced level of dimming f. asoc grp 1

paramInformation.label: Device off and alarm cancellations
paramInformation.description: Enable/disable device off/alarm cancellation updates to 2nd/3rd assoc groups

paramInformation.label: Interval betw. successive readings of temp sensors
Temperature measurement interval
paramInformation.description: Seconds between consecutive measurements of battery level/temperature

paramInformation.label: Insensitiveness to temperature changes.
paramInformation.description: Minimum temperature change value

paramInformation.label: Temperature measurement hysteresis
paramInformation.description: Minimum change in temperature value for report to be sent to controller

paramInformation.label: Alarm BROADCAST
paramInformation.description: Transmit the alarm or control frame in 'broadcast' mode

options.label: Flood broadcast active, Tamper broadcast inactive
Flood broadcast inactive, Tamper broadcast active
Flood and Tamper broadcast mode active

paramInformation.label: Low temperature alarm threshold
paramInformation.description: Temperature value below which LED indicator blinks

paramInformation.label: High temperature alarm threshold
paramInformation.description: Temperature value above which LED indicator blinks

paramInformation.label: Low temperature alarm indicator colour
paramInformation.description: Default is blue (0x000000FF).

paramInformation.label: High temperature alarm indicator colour
paramInformation.description: Default is red (0x00FF0000). 65535 * Red + 256 * Green + Blue

paramInformation.label: Visual temperature indicator
paramInformation.description: Enable or disable visual temperature indicator via device's LED

paramInformation.label: Temperature measurement compensation
paramInformation.description: Temperature value to compensate between air temp

paramInformation.label: Alarm frame for movement/tamper
paramInformation.description: Movement/tamper alarm sent to 1st & 4th assoc. group

options.label: Button and movement tampers alarm active

paramInformation.label: Alarms signalization duration
paramInformation.description: Turn off alarm after given timeout

paramInformation.label: Alarm/basic retransmission time when flooding
paramInformation.description: Time period after which alarm frames will be retransmitted

paramInformation.label: Alarm signalization reactivation period
paramInformation.description: Time period after which an alarm will be turned back on

paramInformation.label: Flood sensor functionality turned off
paramInformation.description: Allows the internal flood sensor to be turned off.

paramInformation.label: Associations in Z-Wave network security mode
paramInformation.description: Defines whether commands are sent as secure or non-secure

options.label: None of the groups are sent as secure
